src:
PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA (utorak): Slavija plaća ceh za Barsin poraz od Levantea, Dortmund vraća Interu "milo za drago"
Pročitajte nekoliko predloga za 5. novembar...

05 Nov 2019


NAPOMENA: 
U rubrici PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA novinari portala MOZZART Sport iznose svoje mišljenje povodom utakmica koje se igraju tog dana, i daju svoje viđenje koji bi ishod mogao da bude postignut na određenim parovima.


Šta vi mislite? Imate li svoje ideje, predloge, fikseve... koje biste podelili s drugima?


Ostavite svoj komentar ispod teksta...

Fiksevi dana
LIGA ŠAMPIONA ID: 4498652
18:55 | Barselona - Slavija Prag
Da li vam je potrebna ikakva pomoć kada je ovaj par u pitanju? Iskreno sumnjamo,  sve osim ubedljivog trijumfa Barselone bilo bi ravno smaku sveta. Domaći su u poslednjoj utakmici kod kuće postigli pet golova, a kako moraju da se iskupe za Levante očekujemo kombinaciju 1&3+.
Mozzart kombinazzije: 1&3+Kvota: 1.47Fiksevi dana
LIGA ŠAMPIONA ID: 4498651
18:55 | Zenit - RB Lajpcig
RB Lajpcig na polovini takmičenja vodi u grupi sa dve pobede i porazom. Zenit nije daleko i "osveta" za neuspeh na Red Bul Areni dovela bi ga na vrh tabele, ali to je mnogo lakše reći, nego učiniti, posebno kada znate da su Nemci u subotu dobili Majnc 8:0. Bolje gađajte GG.
Oba tima daju gol: ggKvota: 1.53Fiksevi dana
LIGA ŠAMPIONA ID: 4498646
21:00 | Valensija - Lil
Valensija je u poslednje vreme sklona tvrdim nerešenim rezultatima, ali u okršajima sa Lilom nikada nije doživela poraz (onaj oktobarski završen je 1:1). S druge strane, Lil je na poslednjih šest gostovanja zabeležio učinak 0-2-4. Stoga sumnjamo u dvojku, opredelite se za 0-2.
Ukupno golova: 0-2Kvota: 1.69Vredi probati
LIGA ŠAMPIONA ID: 4498648
21:00 | Napoli - Salcburg
Iza Napolija je nekoliko veoma teških utakmica u domaćem prvenstvu, zbog čega se prilično dvoumimo. Kec jeste najizvesniji, međutim, ne očekujemo goleadu poput one na njihovoj nedavnoj utakmici u Salcburgu, kada su momci Karla Ančelotija slavili 3:2. Poklonite im poverenje.
 
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 1.9Vredi probati
LIGA ŠAMPIONA ID: 4498645
21:00 | Dortmund - Inter
Kada je Inter u pitanju, sve je moguće. Ekipa Antonija Kontea ume da oduševi protiv favorita, a Dotmund je svakako jedan od njih na svom terenu, ali i da razočara. Mi bismo pokušali sa kecom jer su Milioneri u seriji odličnih rezultata kod kuće, a kvota je primamljiva.
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 2.2Vredi probati
LIGA ŠAMPIONA ID: 4498647
21:00 | Lion - Benfika
Benfika je u boljoj formi nego protivnik koji je tek počeo da se izvlači iz problema u domaćem prvenstvu, ali ne očekujemo da ponovi trijumf iz njihovog lisabonskog okršaja. Možda je kec nešto realniji, mada je sve moguće, no mi ćemo se opredeliti za kombinaciju 1+I&2+II.
Mozzart kombinazzije: 1+I&2+IIKvota: 2.5Vredi probati
LIGA ŠAMPIONA ID: 4498649
21:00 | Čelsi - Ajaks
Čelsi je slavio u Amsterdamu - tesno, ali je ipak došao do veoma važna tri boda. Ajaks teško gubi, vezao je dve ubedljive pobede i mogao bi da namuči veoma raspoloženog protivnika, ali Plavci su na Stamford Bridžu ipak favoriti. Međutim, realno je i 2-3, a kvota je bolja.
Ukupno golova: 2-3Kvota: 2.05Za izbegavanje
BRAZIL 2 ID: 4499224
00:30 | Vitorija - Pelotas
Gosti bolje stoje na tabeli, ali prednost koju imaju nije prevelika (svega pet bodova). Vitorija je od sredine avgusta zabeležila jednu jedinu pobedu pred svojim navijačima, no veoma često igra nerešeno (i to uz malo golova). Kada se sve sabere – izbegavanje je najpametnije.
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 1.8
text:
SUGGESTIONS AND TYPES (Tuesday): Slavia pays a guild for Barsa's defeat by Levante, Dortmund returns Inter "good dear" to Inter
Read some suggestions for November 5 ...

05 Nov 2019


NOTE:
In the PROPOSALS and TYPES section, MOZZART Sport reporters give their opinions on the matches played that day, and give their opinion on what outcome could be achieved in certain pairs.


What do you think? Do you have any ideas, suggestions, fixes ... to share with others?


Leave your comment below ...

Fixes of the day
CHAMPION LEAGUE ID: 4498652
18:55 | Barcelona - Slavia Prague
Do you need any help with this couple? We sincerely doubt that anything but the convincing triumph of Barcelona would be straight to the end of the world. The home side scored five goals in their last game at home, and as they have to redeem themselves for the Levants, we expect a 1 & 3 + combination.
Mozzart Combinations: 1 & 3 + Odds: 1.47Pixels of the Day
CHAMPION LEAGUE ID: 4498651
18:55 | Zenit - RB Leipzig
RB Leipzig leads the group in the half with two wins and a defeat. Zenit is not far away and "revenge" for failure at the Red Bull Arena would put him at the top of the standings, but it's much easier said than done, especially when you know that the Germans won Mainz 8-0 on Saturday. Better target GG.
Both teams score: ggQuota: 1.53Pixels of the day
CHAMPION LEAGUE ID: 4498646
21:00 | Valencia - Lille
Valencia has been prone to hard draws lately, but has never been defeated in a feud with Lil (the one ended October 1: 1). On the other hand, Lille has recorded a 0-2-4 performance in his last six away games. So we doubt the two, opt for 0-2.
Total Goals: 0-2Quotes: 1.69Worth to try
CHAMPION LEAGUE ID: 4498648
21:00 | Naples - Salzburg
There are some very difficult home games behind Napoli, which is why we are rather doubtful. Ace is the most certain, however, we do not expect a goleade like the one at their recent game in Salzburg, when Karl Ancelotti's boys celebrated 3-2. Give them confidence.

Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 1.9Worth to try
CHAMPION LEAGUE ID: 4498645
21:00 | Dortmund - Inter
When it comes to Inter, anything is possible. Antoni Konte's team is able to excel against the favorites, and Dotmund is certainly one of them on their field, but also disappointing. We would try an ace because the Millionaires are in a series of great results at home and the odds are tempting.
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 2.2Worth to try
CHAMPION LEAGUE ID: 4498647
21:00 | Lyon - Benfica
Benfica is in better shape than an opponent who has just started to get out of trouble in the domestic championship, but we do not expect him to repeat his triumph from their Lisbon clash. Ace may be a bit more realistic, though anything is possible, but we will opt for a 1 + I & 2 + II combination.
Mozzart Combinations: 1 + I & 2 + IIQuotes: 2.5Worth to try
CHAMPION LEAGUE ID: 4498649
21:00 | Chelsea - Ajax
Chelsea celebrated in Amsterdam - tight, but still came up with a very important three points. Ajax is losing hard, tying two convincing victories and could torment a very spirited opponent, but the Blues are still favorites at Stamford Bridge. However, in real terms it is also 2-3 and the odd is better.
Total Goals: 2-3Quotes: 2.05To avoid
BRAZIL 2 ID: 4499224
00:30 | Vitoria - Pelotas
The guests are better on the table, but the advantage they have is not too big (only five points). Vitoria have recorded a single win in front of their fans since mid-August, but very often they draw (with few goals). When everything comes together - avoiding it is smartest.
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 1.8
